review: Just received my new toy the Amazon Fire TV. So far it's amazing! It's lighting fast and the voice controller is so easy to use our 4 year old is finding his programs without problems. Great parental control features and easy to navigate. We also have an Apple TV and have problems accessing Pandora and anything related to Amazon (Initial reason for purchasing the Fire TV.) Apple TV allows access for a few minutes then kicks us off harshly :( We were able to use Pandora flawlessly for hours last night. We are able to access Amazon prime videos and Netflix without any problems. The remote is easy to use and has a non-slip surface which I'm happy about as the Apple remote slips out of my hand often. I like the fact that Amazon is giving other companies a run for their money. Congrats to Bezo's and his staff for being so innovative throughout the past years. This is another excellent product on the market and faster than other similar products. You can access cooking recipes, music videos, purchased and free prime movies, and tons more information. A must purchase if you are into technology or making your everyday life more simple to navigate.
